name: ObstetricsVTE
title: Obstetrics VTE
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Describes denominator criteria for DSRIP 47-Hospital Acquired Potentially Preventable Venous Thromboembolism in Appendix A-54),(Data Element Scope: ICD-10CM codes for Obstetrics - VTE),(Inclusion Criteria: As Defined by DSRIP 47),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms listed in Appendix A-54 for ICD-10CM Codes)
